name: Judgment (itch)
description:
Judgment is a entry for Sykoo's Halloween Jam

This game is made by "Another Gamedev Studio"

You will be judged... but not yet.

You will face your eternal punishment in hell after judgment....

Playing as an unseen protagonist who's past life is unknown, you have to navigate in darkness, hiding from someone that's looking for escaping souls (you). 

In this small game, you need to find three keys hidden in three levels, and escape the "courtroom." before they find you. 

---------------------

Controls 

WASD to move

Space to interact with objects in-game (when near them)

Throughout the level, you will find cardboard boxes placed in certain spots. Hide behind them when you hear breathing. Leave them when you think the enemy is gone.

-----------------

Credits

Credit to @M1sterlurk for composing the menu music.

Game ambiance is a shortened version of This soundtrack, which is made and used with permission from "Iron Cthulhu Apocalypse."

Sound effects are from http://soundbible.com/ and are listed under public domain.

All arts and coding is by Unknown_Chan, lead dev of Another Gamedev Studio.
